system.requirements: Tier 2: Survival +10 or Operate (Any), Agility 35. Aptitudes: Agility, Tech
system.effect:
When character succeeds on an Operate Test (or Survival if riding a living steed), they can choose to suffer 1 Fatigue to increase their number of Degrees of Success by Agility Bonus / 2
When character fails on such a test, can choose to suffer 1 Fatigue to reduce their number of Degrees of Failiure by Agility Bonus / 2 (min 1).
